sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../context/authContext' export default function NavBar() { const { isAuthenticated, logout, user } = useAuth() const logoutFunction = () => { logout() } // function para actualizar la pagina function actualizar() { if (!user) { window.location.reload(); } } return (
Tasks Manager {isAuthenticated ? ( <>
  • Welcome {user.nombre}
  • Add Task
  • Tasks
) : ( <>
  • Login (current)
  • register
)}
) }
